name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pikashow for PC - Windows and Mac

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Extension provide Pikashow Features and Updates Status.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension created for share the latest updates and features of piakshow app. Install it to get new version alert. 

Pikashow is an app that lets you watch movies and some of your favorite TV shows right from your phone for free. You will find 1500+ Live TV Channels, a Movies Collection, Songs Gallery, On-Demand Content. The app is also free to use so you can download and use it for free on your phone. 

Pikashow is unique in that it lets you stream movies from your phone without overloading the phone. Most apps like the Pikashow app may let you watch movies or TV shows on your phone but it will really drain your phone making it warm up.

Thanks for using this Extension.
